The Leather-Bound Sacrilege

Have you ever wanted to re-write your story? To change your future with the words you wield? When Annabelle Sorrentino stumbles across a mystical book in her mother’s attic, this is the dilemma that she is faced with. With a power as tempting as the devil himself, and potentially just as evil, how far is she willing to go to fulfil her darkest desires? Weighed down by the Book’s bloody and destructive past, Anna must tread carefully if she is to make it out of this alive.
